meanings.definition: The longest side of a right triangle, opposite the right angle.
meanings.sent1: In a right triangle, the hypotenuses is always opposite the right angle.
meanings.sent2: The hypotenuses of a right triangle can be found using the Pythagorean theorem.
meanings.sent3: The hypotenuses of the triangle decided to take a break and relax in the shade.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the hypotenuses that guided her through the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the hypotenuses made it stand out among the other sides.
